entities.name: ORIGINAL EQUIPMENT MANUFACTURERS
entities.description: Company that includes software on PCs sold

entities.name: CUSTOMERS
entities.description: Individuals or organizations that acquire software products and services offerings through a financing program

entities.name: INTERNAL SALES FORCE
entities.description: Sales team responsible for selling products and services

entities.description: Centers that provide support for products

relationships.relationship_description: Customers acquire products and services, which may be facilitated by partner sales incentive programs
Internal sales force and partner sales are both involved in the sales process
Product support service centers provide support to customers
Product distribution centers distribute products to customers
